mapper.update: UPDATE sys_res SET resName=#{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , alias=#{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sn=#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , icon=#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , parentId=#{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , defaultUrl=#{defaultUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , isFolder=#{isFolder,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isDisplayInMenu=#{isDisplayInMenu,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isOpen=#{isOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isControl=#{isControl,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , systemId=#{systemId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, path =#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE resId=#{resId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SYS_RES WHERE systemId=#{systemId} AND parentId=#{parentId} ORDER BY sn
SELECT FROM SYS_RES WHERE parentId=#{parentId} ORDER BY sn

SELECT DISTINCT res.resId,res.resName,res.alias,res.sn,res.icon,res.parentId,res.defaultUrl, res.isFolder,res.isDisplayInMenu,res.isOpen,res.systemId,res.isControl FROM SYS_ROLE_RES role_res, SYS_USER_ROLE user_role, SYS_RES res WHERE user_role.userId=#{userId} AND role_res.roleId=user_role.roleId AND role_res.resId=res.resId AND res.systemId=#{systemId} AND res.isDisplayInMenu=1 ORDER BY sn

SELECT DISTINCT res.resId,res.resName,res.alias,res.sn,res.icon,res.parentId,res.defaultUrl, res.isFolder,res.isDisplayInMenu,res.isOpen,res.systemId,res.isControl FROM SYS_ROLE_RES role_res, SYS_RES res WHERE role_res.roleId in (select t.roleid from sys_role t where t.alias in (${rolealias})) AND role_res.resId=res.resId AND res.systemId=#{systemId} AND res.isDisplayInMenu=1 ORDER BY sn
SELECT FROM SYS_RES WHERE systemId=#{systemId} AND isDisplayInMenu=1 ORDER BY sn

SELECT DISTINCT A.defaultUrl url ,C.alias AS role FROM SYS_RES A LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_RES B ON (A.resId=B.resId) LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE C ON (B.roleId=C.roleId) WHERE A.systemId=#{systemId} and A.defaultUrl is not null
SELECT DISTINCT C.alias AS role,A.alias AS func FROM SYS_RES A Left outer join SYS_ROLE_RES B on A.resId=B.resId left outer join SYS_ROLE C on B.roleId=C.roleId where A.systemId=#{systemId}
SELECT count(1) as count FROM SYS_RES WHERE systemId=#{systemId} AND alias=#{alias}
SELECT count(1) as count FROM SYS_RES WHERE systemId=#{systemId} AND alias=#{alias} and resId!=#{resId}
